kumAra-SaSThI-vratam.description_short: `upavAsam` with only water and next day `pAraNa` gives `Arogyam`
kumAra-SaSThI-vratam.Shloka:
ASADha zuklaSaSThI tu tithiH kaumArilA smRtA.
kumAramarcayEttatra pUrvatrOpESya vai dinam..

SaSThIdEvI-SaSThI-vratam.description_short: Skanda darshanam is recommended, removes sins including brahmahatya.
SaSThIdEvI-SaSThI-vratam.Shloka:
yO'syAM pazyati gAGgEyaM dakSiNApathavAsinam .
brahmahatyAdi pApaistu mucyatE nAtra saMzayaH ..

subrahmaNya-SaSThI-vratam.Shloka:
sEnAvidAraka skanda mahAsEna mahAbala.
rudrOmAgnija SaDvaktra gaGgAgarbha namO'stu tE..

bhAnusaptamI.description_short: `saptamI tithi` on a Sunday is as sacred as a solar eclipse. Particularly good for worshipping Surya.
bhAnusaptamI.Shloka:
amAvasyA tu sOmEna saptamI bhAnunA saha.
caturthI bhUmiputrENa sOmaputrENa cASTamI.
 catasrastithayastvEtAH sUryagrahaNasannibhAH..

bhAnusaptamI*.description_short: `saptamI tithi` on a Sunday is as sacred as a solar eclipse. Particularly good for worshipping Surya. Today is even more auspicious, as it is associated with `revatI` star.
bhAnusaptamI*.Shloka:
amAvasyA tu sOmEna saptamI bhAnunA saha.
caturthI bhUmiputrENa sOmaputrENa cASTamI.
 catasrastithayastvEtAH sUryagrahaNasannibhAH..

budhASTamI.description_short: `aSTamI tithi` on a Wednesday is as sacred as a solar eclipse.
budhASTamI.Shloka:
amAvasyA tu sOmEna saptamI bhAnunA saha.
caturthI bhUmiputrENa sOmaputrENa cASTamI.
 catasrastithayastvEtAH sUryagrahaNasannibhAH..

aGgAraka-caturthI.description_short: `caturthI tithi` on a Tuesday is as sacred as a solar eclipse. Good day for doing puja of Ganesha/Subrahmanya with naivedyam of modakam/millet flour respectively.
aGgAraka-caturthI.Shloka:
amAvasyA tu sOmEna saptamI bhAnunA saha.
caturthI bhUmiputrENa sOmaputrENa cASTamI.
 catasrastithayastvEtAH sUryagrahaNasannibhAH..

kRSNAGgAraka-caturdazI-puNyakAlaH/yamata.description_short: `kRSNa caturdazI tithi` on a Tuesday is very sacred. Perform `tarpaNa` to Yama Dharamaraja.

sOma-amAvasyA.description_short: `amAvasyA` on a Monday is as sacred as a solar eclipse. Particularly good for performing pradakshinam of Pippala tree.
sOma-amAvasyA.Shloka:
amAvasyA tu sOmEna saptamI bhAnunA saha.
caturthI bhUmiputrENa sOmaputrENa cASTamI.
 catasrastithayastvEtAH sUryagrahaNasannibhAH.. mUlatO brahmarUpAya madhyatO viSNurUpiNE.
agrataH zivarUpAya vRkSarAjAya tE namaH..
akSispandaM bhujaspandaM duHsvapnaM durvicintanam .
 zatrUnAm ca samutpannam azvattha zamayasva mE ..

candra-darzanam.description_short: Have darshan of Moon today, chanting the following shloka
candra-darzanam.Shloka:
zvEtAmbaraH zvEtavibhUSaNazca zvEtadyutirdaNDadharO dvibAhuH.
candrO'mRtAtmA varadaH kirITI mayi prasAdaM vidadhAtu dEvaH..

ajA-EkAdazI.description_short: Satya Harishchandra performed this to get back family and kingdom.

indirA-EkAdazI.description_short: Indrasena's son did Ekadashi and as a result he was shifted from hell to heaven.

zayana-EkAdazI.Shloka:
vAsudEva jagadyOnE prAptEyaM dvAdazI tava.
bhujaGgazayanE'bdhau ca sukhaM svapihi mAdhava..
iyaM tu dvAdazI dEva zayanArthaM vinirmita .
asyAM suptE jagannAthE jagatsuptaM bhavEdidam ..
vibuddhE tvayi buddhyEta sarvamEtaccarAcaram ..

parivartinI-EkAdazI.description_short: Side ways turn inside sleep of Vishnu midway after Shayana Ekadashi.
parivartinI-EkAdazI.Shloka:
vAsudEva jagannAtha prAptEyaM dvAdazI tava.
 pArzvEna parivartasva sukhaM svapihi mAdhava..

saGkaTahara-caturthI-vratam.description_short: Special vrata day for Ganesha. Fast during the day and pray to Ganesha after moonrise, as follows:
saGkaTahara-caturthI-vratam.Shloka:
gaNAdhipastvaM dEvEza caturthyAM pUjitO mayA.
kaSTAn mAM mOcayEzAna sarvamiSTaM ca dEhi mE..

vijayA~bhAnusaptamI.description_short: `saptamI tithi` on a Sunday is as sacred as a solar eclipse. Particularly good for worshipping Surya. When `zukla saptamI` is present at sunrise, it is called `vijayA`.
vijayA~bhAnusaptamI.Shloka:
amAvasyA tu sOmEna saptamI bhAnunA saha.
caturthI bhUmiputrENa sOmaputrENa cASTamI.
 catasrastithayastvEtAH sUryagrahaNasannibhAH..

vijayA~bhAnusaptamI*.description_short: `saptamI tithi` on a Sunday is as sacred as a solar eclipse. Particularly good for worshipping Surya. When `zukla saptamI` is present at sunrise, it is called `vijayA`.
vijayA~bhAnusaptamI*.Shloka:
amAvasyA tu sOmEna saptamI bhAnunA saha.
caturthI bhUmiputrENa sOmaputrENa cASTamI.
 catasrastithayastvEtAH sUryagrahaNasannibhAH..

bhaumAzvinI-puNyakAlaH.description_short: When Ashwini nakshatram falls on a Tuesday, it is a special `puNyakAlaH`. Do `upAsanA` of Lakshmi Narasimha.

budhAnUrAdhA-puNyakAlaH.description_short: When Anuradha nakshatram falls on a Wednesday, it is a special `puNyakAlaH` for performing danams. One can do dAnaM of dadhyodanam in Vishnu temples on this day.

ta:mAci~cevvAy.description_short: Do `upavAsam` (at least do not take salt) and pray to Lord Shiva (Vaidyanatha Swami).

ta:puraTTAci~can2ikkizhamai.description_short: Perform special puja and naivedyam (e.g. `tilAnnam`) to Lord Venkateshwara.

*cUDAmaNi-candra-grahaNam.description_short: When a lunar eclipse occurs on a Monday, it is even more special: `cUDAmaNi`, i.e. crest jewel.

*cUDAmaNi-sUrya-grahaNam.description_short: When a solar eclipse occurs on a Sunday, it is even more special: `cUDAmaNi`, i.e. crest jewel.

AyuSmAn-bava-saumya.description_short: A rare combination of `AyuSmAn yOga, bava karaNa` and `saumyavAsara`. Also a source of the normal blessing 'AyuSmAn bava saumya'!

jayantI~mahAdvAdazI.description_short: Dvadashi tithi, combined with Punarvasu nakshatram.

jayA~mahAdvAdazI.description_short: Dvadashi tithi, combined with Pushya nakshatram.

mahAjayA~saptamI.description_short: Saptami tithi, combined with a sankranti.

mahOdaya-puNyakAlaH.description_short: A rare combination of Pausha masam, Shravana nakshatram, Vyatipata yogam and Monday.

ardhOdaya-puNyakAlaH.description_short: A rare combination of Pausha masam, Shravana nakshatram, Vyatipata yogam and Sunday.

pApanAzinI~mahAdvAdazI.description_short: Dvadashi tithi, combined with Rohini nakshatram.

vAruNI~trayOdazI.description_short: Phalguna Krishna Chaturdashi, combined with Shatabhishak Nakshatram.

mahAvAruNI~trayOdazI.description_short: Phalguna Krishna Chaturdashi, combined with Shatabhishak Nakshatram and Saturday.

mahAmahAvAruNI~trayOdazI.description_short: Phalguna Krishna Chaturdashi, combined with Shatabhishak Nakshatram, Saturday and Shubha Yogam.

vijayA/zravaNa~mahAdvAdazI.description_short: Dvadashi tithi, combined with Shravana nakshatram.
